languages.text: "Рядом с убитым никого не было — стража оставила свой пост. Это вы им приказали?"

traits.locale_text: "Рядом с убитым никого не было — стража оставила свой пост. Это вы им приказали?"

languages.text: "There was no one near the deceased — the wardens had left their post. Did you order them to do so?"
languages.original_text: "Рядом с убитым никого не было — стража оставила свой пост. Это вы им приказали?"

traits.locale_text: "There wasn't any guards near the deceased — they have left their posts. Did you order them to do so?"
"There wasn't any guards near the deceased — they have left their posts. Did you order them to do so?"
"There weren't any guards near the deceased—they had vacated their duty postings. Did you order them to do so?"
"There weren't any guards near the deceased—they had vacated their duty postings. Did you order them to do so?"
"There was no one near the deceased — the wardens had left their post. Did you order them to do so?"
"There was no one near the deceased — the wardens had left their post. Did you order them to do so?"

languages.text: 「故人の近くには誰もいなかった…ワーデンたちが持ち場を離れていたからだ。お前が彼らに命じたのか？」
languages.original_text: "There was no one near the deceased — the wardens had left their post. Did you order them to do so?"

traits.locale_text: 「故人の近くには誰もいなかった…ワーデンたちが持ち場を離れていたからだ。お前が彼らに命じたのか？」

languages.text: “死者附近一个人都没有，那些看守离开了岗位。这是你下的命令吗？”
languages.original_text: "There was no one near the deceased — the wardens had left their post. Did you order them to do so?"

traits.locale_text: “死者附近一个人都没有，那些看守离开了岗位。这是你下的命令吗？”

languages.text: « Il n'y avait personne alentour. Les gardes avaient quitté leur poste. Le leur aviez-vous ordonné ? »
languages.original_text: "There was no one near the deceased — the wardens had left their post. Did you order them to do so?"

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y avait personne alentour. Les gardes avaient quitté leur poste. Le leur aviez-vous ordonné ? »

languages.text: «No había nadie cerca del muerto. Los guardias habían abandonado su puesto. ¿Se lo había ordenado usted?».
languages.original_text: "There was no one near the deceased — the wardens had left their post. Did you order them to do so?"

traits.locale_text: «No había nadie cerca del muerto. Los guardias habían abandonado su puesto. ¿Se lo había ordenado usted?».

languages.text: "Es war niemand in der Nähe der Verstorbenen ... die Wächter hatten ihren Posten verlassen. Kam der entsprechende Befehl von Euch?"
languages.original_text: "There was no one near the deceased — the wardens had left their post. Did you order them to do so?"

traits.locale_text: "Es befanden sich keine Wachen in der Nähe des Verstorbenen. Sie hatten ihren Posten verlassen. Habt Ihr ihnen das befohlen?"

languages.text: "Merhumun yakınında kimse yoktu. Dizdarlar, garnizonu terk etmiş. Bunu sen mi emrettin?"
languages.original_text: "There was no one near the deceased — the wardens had left their post. Did you order them to do so?"

traits.locale_text: "Merhumun yakınında kimse yokmuş. Muhafızlar garnizonu terk etmiş. Emri veren sen miydin?"
